controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchResultController is the class for controlling how search results are displayed This class allows the user to view an individual photo close up
    Author:
    Chris LoPresti, Kyle Myers
